entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
